title: Sports Coach Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Leo University in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Was very pleasant to meet with the staff. Seems like a wonderful place to call home and be a part of a family. Would recommend for anyone interested to join
Interview Questions: What makes me want to succeed

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: IT interview is pretty simple and easy to pass as long as you know the basics of IT and understand the basics of IT and work well with others. They will take you into the back room or set up at teams call if it is a teams call I'm not entirely sure if its and on ground they'll take you into the back room
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work here?

title: Adjunct Faculty Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: Super friendly with great interview questions. Interviewer was friendly and helpful. I didn’t feel like there were any difficult questions that I would not be able to answer. Overall, great experience.
Interview Questions: Why do you feel you would be a good fit for this job?

title: Manager of Marketing Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: The Interview was good. Got to see campus and the school. Learned a lot about the job and the chances for me to succeed. Looks like a great chance for people that are willing to work hard.
Interview Questions: How are you looking to enhance the brand?

title: Resident Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: 2 Part interview process: Initial group interview to test attitude and ability to work with another. Second interview with leadership team to check personal fit and past experience. Any past experience showing adaptability and the ability to work as a team are highly valued.
Interview Questions: What is one experience that makes you prepared to deal with any situation that may arise.

title: Student Minister Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Saint Leo, FL) in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: You will be asked to start the interview with a prayer since you will be expected to be a prayerful leader in tbs role, you will continue with skills, both good skills and negative qualities, how you responded in the past to particular situations, and why you want the job.
Interview Questions: What is your best quality?

title: Assistant Director of Admissions In the Texas Region Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Leo University in Jul 2020
Interview Descriptions: The first interview was by phone. It was pretty thorough and lasted about 45 minutes. The second interview was with a panel of four staff members. It lasted about 30 minutes. I was told they'd get back with me in about a week, but I never heard back.
Interview Questions: What makes me a good fit for the position?

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Leo University in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: The AVP who interviewed me during the phone screen was excellent and personable.  No major issues.  I decline because the salary was lower than what I anticipated.  Great opportunity though.
Interview Questions:
Why do you think you are good fit for the role?
Why are you looking to leave your current position?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: They email you, help you schedule an interview. You need to be let into the building. The process of questions is about 15-20 minutes. They ask standard interview questions and let you know if you got a offer 1-2 weeks later
Interview Questions: What type of job I would want after college

title: Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Tampa, FL) in May 2018
Interview Descriptions: The interview proess went really smoothly.  I was interviewed by two people on the hiring committee who were both very friendly. It felt more like a conversation than an interrogation. I felt very comfortable to accept the offer to join this workplace culture.
Interview Questions: Provide an example of a conflict you've had and how it was resolved.

title: HRBP Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Saint Leo, FL)
Interview Descriptions: Applied online and was contacted within a week. Did a phone interview with two of the managers, then interviewed with them in person. Following that interview I met with the AVP eventually,  after the interview had to be rescheduled 3 times. Was told that I would be contacted by the end of the week with their decision. It took 3 weeks for them to reach out to me, which I found to be very unprofessional and a waste of my time.
Interview Questions: Why should we hire you?

title: Instructional Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (San Antonio, FL)
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was overall positive. Interviewers were friendly and allowed time for me to ask questions.  I felt that the questions were fair. They asked to provide examples for may questions.
Interview Questions: Have you used constructivism in your design?

title: Ad Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Tampa, FL) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Assist the Director with implementing, evaluating, and assessing programs offered to undergraduate students.  There are many opportunities for creating programs.  The phone interview was a breeze, but the panel interview was more intense, speaking with multiple entities from the campus.
Interview Questions: What is your greatest strength?

title: Director of Applications Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Saint Leo, FL) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: Skype then onsite, BUT the CIO is not one to be trusted.  Gave me a verbal, did the background check that was clean, then two weeks later he "reconsidered"...
Interview Questions: How to you feel about titles?

title: Server Administrator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Dade City, FL) in May 2017
Interview Descriptions: Basic phone interview that lead to a face to face interview. My main issue was the lack of follow up, after being told that I would be notified for a yes or no. If you can't take the time to even tell someone no, you are wasting their time.
Interview Questions: Just your average questions about experience and how you would fit in there.

title: Intern Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: Very comfortable and friendly; learned more than I thought  I would; enjoyable process, regardless of getting job or not; very informative process. Best interview I have ever had in my past interviews
Interview Questions: "What would you do in this situation?"

title: Adjunct Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Tampa, FL) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: A conversation regarding philosophy and philosophers, teaching and students, testing and grading reading assignments and quizzes, student apathy and teacher hubris, administrative goals and adjunct pay, teaching availability options and parking.
Interview Questions: Explain your teaching experience?

title: Enrollment Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Las Vegas, NV)
Interview Descriptions: 4 interviews,  one on the phone with HR coordinator, then one in person with your executive director and associate director, then one in person or on the phone depending if he is town with the Vice President, then the last interview on the phone with the president of enrollment. If you make it past the 1st (2) interviews you should be fine!
Interview Questions: Tell me about your experience and how it relates to the position?

title: Student Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Saint Leo University in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions:
The process took less than a week. I applied for the position online and was called for an interview later. The phone interview, which felt like more of a friendly conversation, took about an hour with someone who would become my direct supervisor. After that I was invited to have video interview with supervisors at the director level, and was offered the job later that day.

Once the offer came through, there were many hoops to jump through to get an offer letter, finger printed and licensed. While the interview process took a week, the hiring process took over a month.
Interview Questions: How would you deal with a difficult student?

title: Administration Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: The interview process took some time from application to final offer.  If selected you are called for phone interview and then if selected from there you are called for campus panel interview, and then an offer is extended if you are final candidate.
Interview Questions: What type of environment you work best in

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Tampa, FL) in Mar 2016
Interview Descriptions: Nothing unexpected. Teaching demo and other questions. I was contacted via phone and had a shor talk with the chair then I was invited on-campus for an entire day interview in-person. All went well.
Interview Questions: Nothing unexpected

title: Academic Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Saint Augustine, FL)
Interview Descriptions: First there was face to face interview and then they called and offered me the job. It was very easy and I think they cared more about personality and recruiting skills over experience or education.
Interview Questions: Experience?

title: Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Tampa, FL)
Interview Descriptions: This was the second interview for a positions that provided student services.  Was given two topics and requested to create and plan a presentation.  I had to present it to two people and then there was a follow up interview.
Interview Questions: If you could be any kind of animal, what kind would you be and why....

title: Enrollment Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Saint Leo University
Interview Descriptions: There are a number of phone interviews and a face to face that includes meeting with various members of management and a panel of future co-workers. None of the people you meet with are honest and forthcoming about the position. Your role is to be a telemarketer, but no one tells you that. It is a deceptive process.
Interview Questions: None. It's the usual questions and very casual.

title: Enrollment Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Tampa, FL) in Jun 2013
Interview Descriptions: it was a rigorous process with 3 interviews. If you make it past the 2nd interview you basically have the job. Most important to just be yourself. Ask questions. Learn the core values of the university as this will be helpful and will likely impress them.
Interview Questions: what super hero would you be?

title: Enrollment Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Tampa, FL) in Aug 2012
Interview Descriptions:
Basic interview. General questions. Nothing challenging.
1: Can you tell me something about yourself?
2: Why did you apply for this job?
3: Why did you leave your last job? / Why are you planning to leave your present job?
Interview Questions:
Past job performance related to expected tasks.
1: Can you tell me something about yourself?
2: Why did you apply for this job?
3: Why did you leave your last job? / Why are you planning to leave your present job?

title: Student Worker for Admissions Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Saint Leo University (Saint Leo, FL) in Aug 2011
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed by the secretary for the VP of Admissions. It was very laid back. I was able to find out what I would be doing and how often. It was in an office setting and one on one. I was told to relax and it would be an easy process because I had work study.
Interview Questions: What is your biggest weakness?

title: Faculty Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Leo University in Feb 2011
Interview Descriptions: Resume, wait for call back. Phone call interview for online job several years ago. Interview was fairly easy. Accepted the position. Found the company's description of the job fairly accurate as to what the position actually entailed.
Interview Questions: Are you comfortable with using a computer?

Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Saint Leo University in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: Was very pleasant to meet with the staff. Seems like a wonderful place to call home and be a part of a family. Would recommend for anyone interested to join
Interview Questions: What makes me want to succeed
